Direct message the job poster from Storm5
Sam Donoghue
Connecting the best Data and Engineering talent with innovative RetailTechs worldwide | Storm 5
⚡
VP of Data Science⚡
Programmatic AdTech⚡ USA (Remote)Storm5 are currently working with a leader in the exploding category of Programmatic Advertising, in search of an experienced Data Science Leader. Our client is focused on unleashing the full economic potential of digital media companies by making digital advertising markets and technologies designed to deliver optimal value to both publishers and advertisers on every ad served across all screens.Responsibilities: Manage, mentor and lead the current Data organisationCollaborating with executives on the implementation of key projects and initiativesWork closely with stakeholdersDefining the direction of growth of the Data function and team.Requirements:Background in AdTechExperience leading a variety of data teams with 7+ years in leadership rolesAbility to align a high-performing technical team to organizational goals.Excellent communication skills to foster a relationship among colleagues at all levelsStrategic leader who can manage expectations for the future while maintaining and executing current trends📧 Interested in applying? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button.After you have applied, feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn to discuss the role in more detail or email me your resume at sam.donoghue@storm5.com⚡ Storm5 is a specialist RetailTech recruitment firm with clients across Europe, APAC and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website at storm5.com and follow the Storm5 LinkedIn page for the latest jobs and intel.
